metadata.title: CVE-2024-35865 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved: smb:client: fix potential UAF in smb2_is_valid_oplock_break() Skip sessionsthat are being teared down (status == SES_EXITING) to avoid UAF.

criterions.comment: linux: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'ESM criteria, was needed').
